thread.title: Wonderful New York Hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful New York Hotel - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Trina S
title: Wonderful New York Hotel
text: My husband and I stay at the Roosevelt every time we travel to New York now. The midtown location is excellent. Just a short walk to Grand Central Station and Times Square. The rooms are on the small side which is typical of NYC but they are quite comfortable. The bar is a nice spot to sit and people watch.
